subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Seattle SuperSonics introduced P. J. Carlesimo as their coach, and the former All-Star forward, Grant Hill, whose career has been plagued by injury, agreed in principle to a two-year deal with the Phoenix Suns.
snippet: The Seattle SuperSonics introduced P. J. Carlesimo as their coach, and the former All-Star forward, Grant Hill, whose career has been plagued by injury, agreed in principle to a two-year deal with the Phoenix Suns.
